I can sense the misfortune that has befallen my son, Centerfold,
through the connection we share as a family.
So you died covered with wounds like this...
I sense it through this pain, the same pain you felt.
You were magnificent as you fought for Lord Dio, Centerfold!
To kill someone like you, with a soul so pure...
I am sure they did something underhanded.
I will make sure they pay a terrifying price
Now is the time to take action...
With the Stand that kills slowly!
Jojo and company are heading to the sacred city, Varanasi, by bus.
Stupid people are stupid because they do not understand something
The characters, groups, places, laws, and names used in this program have no connection to any existing in real life.
even when you keep repeating it.
You know guys like that, right?
Idiots that just do not understand.
a wealthy family in the sacred city Varanasi that we are passing through, right?
You are good-looking, and I can see that you are a smart girl.
I have an eye for people, so I am going to lecture you.
Hol Horse is a horrible, lying bastard.
You cannot end up like this.
It is easy to do that when you are in love...
But you cannot look at things this way.
It is important to look broadly, and be rational.
Saints, the old, the sickly, children,
cows, dogs, monkeys, food, excrement, burning corpses...
This river gently embraces all these things as it flows.
Everything from birth to death is laid bare in this river.
It is said that people can spend months
here in the sacred city of Varanasi without getting bored.
That is probably because the scenery one sees in this city
reflects the scenery of one's soul.
Looks like the spot that I thought was a bug bite got infected.
It would be best to have a doctor look at it before it gets worse.
Hey, does not that sort of look like a person's face?
Want me to go to the hospital with you?
Stop treating me like an old man.
If we do not cut it off and get the poison out, it will get worse.
Cannot we just put some medicine and a bandage on it?
We will numb the area, so it will not hurt.
I do not want to watch it being cut off.
You are pretty stupid, you moron!
I am the Empress, as in the Empress card, Old Man Joseph!
And now, I am going to bloody you up good!
When did you get on me, damn it?!
Th-Thank goodness it was my artificial hand.
You are going to cut yourself?
I am part of your body, Old Man Joseph.
You cannot get away from me now, honey.
Now, why do not I guess what you are thinking?
This is what you are thinking...
Stands can only be beaten by other Stands.
Your Stand, Hermit Purple, uses the power of remote viewing,
the ability to see things far away.
Can that defeat the thing that is fused with your arm?
Where was I when you stuck to me?
Are you going to your friends?
I wonder if it will go that smoothly.
Doctor, your next patient is waiting...
Do not get the wrong idea!
I am staying at Hotel Clarks!
I have a thing for hot young nurses like yourself.
Now you cannot go back to the hotel.
Now I can kill you without anyone getting in the way!
I will crush you to bits!
Take care of it, you shitty old man.
What are you holding on to?
It is been a while since it came to this...
You think your Hamon would work against your own body?
I can use Hermit Purple this way, too!
I told you not to move!
Real men do not talk big.
That is how you figure out who is a liar.
Since I was avoiding the police,
I ended up going in the opposite direction of the hotel.
If I would known this would happen,
I would have taken Polnareff with me.
Instead of a petty guy like Hol Horse,
I do not dwell on the past.
I do not care who you were dating in the past.
What is important is the future.
If our feelings understand each other.
That place is a hotel run by a Japanese woman named Kumiko.
She manages it with her Indian husband.
We can probably get a room very cheap.
You stole those at the market!
You might say I am mooching off my parent...
Well, I guess in this case it would be my parent's arm, Papa.
I will show you that I, Joseph Joestar,
have many years more fighting experience than you!
I said that, but what the hell am I going to do?
Father, thank you for raising me.
But you should not tie your children down like this.
You need to raise your children to be free.
I want to use Hermit Purple's remote viewing to find the user,
but I do not have a camera!
At this rate... is not just my arm,
but my whole body going to become part of her?
I have now grown enough that I can kill you.
My hand can reach your neck.
If I bust the carotid artery in your neck, you are done for.
That guy's got a nasty-looking growth on his arm.
I am a woman who cannot survive without a reliable man.
Because you are very reliable and kind.
H-Hey, where did all that come from?
I am totally going to fall for her!
You keep getting further and further from Jotaro and the others.
Do you think I am running around randomly just to wear myself out?
I am running so I can kill you!
I could dunk you in this!
I picked it up when we were rolling around on the ground earlier.
So I can cut open your carotid artery!
Did you think I would suffocate if you stuck me in here?
I have a physical form, but I am not a living organism.
Hey, did not you say you were going to show
the difference in our fighting experience earlier?
Where is that experience you were talking about?
You are just a helpless geezer who is gotten too old!
They were on the verge of breaking from her attack earlier,
and now I cannot get any strength in them...
Your life as an invalid is about to come to an end.
There is not a single way you can defeat m
Sorry, my hearing is not what it used to be.
Run that by me one more time.
You stuck me into coal tar!
It was not to suffocate me, but to solidify me!
How did you know there was coal tar in there?
With the power of my Stand, Hermit Purple.
The ashes that foreigner spilled everywhere...
They have formed into a map of the city.
That is how you found the coal tar.
You used the ashes to make a spirit photo!
Now I think you should be able to see the difference in our fighting experience.
Once your opponent starts to boast his victory, he has already lost.
This is how Joseph Joestar does things.
I guess I just get better with age.
A Stand can tear away another Stand.
You are going to say, Stop, anything but that.
Children cannot depend on their parents forever.
You have got to go out on your own once you have grown big!
Now then... where is this Stand user?
Let us swear our love with a kiss.
So that is The Empress's Stand user...
She attached her Stand to me as a tumor with a human face,
and camouflaged herself as a beautiful woman.
And here I thought we would finally be able to sleep in a bed.
Maybe if the old man had not screwed up and gotten cops chasing him down.
Polnareff, you can do the driving.
Hey, are you still in shock?
I was the one attacked by the Stand.
I would rather have gone through that...
So, we are finally leaving India.
Did you see the driver's face?
More trouble would be especially bad now.
By the way... do you like sumo?
